Text: FW Revised managers amdtis a managers amendment that Chairman Leach of the Banking Committee is considering I would imagine that section would be of particular interest to Enron given that it provides unconditional legal certainty for all wholesale individually negotiated derivatives This provision may prove controversial and there is little time between now and our Thursday markup Steve Ganis Counsel Committee on Banking and Financial Services US House of Representatives MANAGERSPDF
